page.title: 06FARMS
page.content: The area has a lot of land which is not built on but is used for farming. All the farmers own their farms, there are no tenant farms. Some of the farms have decreased in size as they have sold some of their land for building new housing estates, schools or motorway development. The average size of each farm is approximately one hundred and fifty to two hundred acres. Most of the land is pasture as the farmers concentrate on dairy farming, beef and sheep rearing. The farms have been in local families for many years and the farm buildings are very old. The farm work is done by the families themselves using a great deal of modern machinery and very little local labour.
